channel.title: Java is not rec... as an internal or external commands... HOW DO I FIX THIS?
channel.description:
i downloaded pur3zscape 525 source and i tried to run the server, but this happen:
java is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue. . .
This is inside the runserver folder:
@echo off title Pur3zscape 525 java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause
PLZ HELP ME

item.title: Java is not rec... as an internal or external commands... HOW DO I FIX THIS?
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

You’re running on a 64-bit pc, you have to download the 32-bit jdk. Go to your “C:/” Make a new folder called “Program Files” Then go into that folder and make a new one called “Java” then extract the jdk into that file.

Read full topic
item.source: Java is not rec... as an internal or external commands... HOW DO I FIX THIS?
